examples: I'm not hog-wild about this job

phrases: Congress will go hog-wild in its spending
People went hog-wild at the news, assuming that we'd found the magic fat pill for society at large.
But, says Twin, she changed her mind before he ever got to see her go hog-wild.
But coaches should avoid the temptation to go hog-wild with changes.
If you want to go hog-wild, order the grilled lobster, which had claws like boxing gloves the evening I sampled it, with flavor to match.
